kizuna_friend_b_01:
[BD06:0][trnm:0]! Boy, did you pick
a\r
great\r
moment\r
to\r
stop\r
on by![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_03a:
This is supposed to be a sample from my mom’s
research from back when she was a student![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_03b:
This is supposed to be a sample from my dad’s
research from back when he was a student![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_04:
Hehe, that’s what Director Clavell here told me.
He’s been helping me out.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_head_01a:
When Sada was a student at this academy, I was
still a mere researcher myself.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_01b:
When Turo was a student at this academy, I was
still a mere researcher myself.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_02a:
Among my peers, it was already being bandied
about that an astoundingly gifted young woman\r
was studying at Naranja Academy.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_02b:
Among my peers, it was already being bandied
about that an astoundingly gifted young man was\r
studying at Uva Academy.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_05a:
So she really was always amazing...right from the
start, huh?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_05b:
So he really was always amazing...right from the
start, huh?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_06:
Oh! I guess I never really questioned it, but...
why IS your office full of all this equipment?[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_head_03: Ho! So you’ve finally noticed, have you?[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_04a: This room was once your mother’s research lab.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_04b: This room was once your father’s research lab.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_05:
From what I’ve heard recounted, [s;:gs]he apparently
would become so absorbed in h[er;is:gs] research that\r
[s;:gs]he hardly ever returned to h[er;is:gs] dorm room.\c
[Sh;H:gs]e spent most nights sleeping here, in fact.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_06:
I also find myself more at ease surrounded by
such research equipment, so I took the liberty\r
of adapting the room to serve as my office.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_08a:
All these pieces of my mom’s life—they were
right in front of me this whole time...[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_08b:
All these pieces of my dad’s life—they were
right in front of me this whole time...[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_09:
I spent so long trying not to think about h[er;im:gs]
that I never even noticed...until now.[npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_10: Thanks for telling me about this, Director Clavell![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_11:
[BD06:0]And, [trnm:0], thanks for being
here\r
with\r
me\r
to\r
learn\r
about\r
it, too![npcn:6]
kizuna_friend_b_head_07:
Ah, Master Arven! I also intended to explain
about these trophies here—[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_08:
And he is already gone. Rather hard to pin down,
isn’t he?\c
Off like a flash as soon as some new thought
crosses his mind.[npcn:A]
kizuna_friend_b_head_10:
I think that son of yours takes after you a very
great deal.[npcn:A]
